sqlMap.statement: SELECT UPLD_CSV_RQST_ROW_NUM ,DUW.LOC_NUM ,DUW.DUNS_NUM ,DUW.DS_ULT_DUNS_NUM ,DUW.HQ_DUNS_NUM ,DUW.DS_LOC_EMP_NUM ,DUW.DS_LOC_REV_AMT ,DUW.DS_CUST_SIC_CD ,DUW.DS_CUST_SIC_DESC_TXT FROM DUNS_UPLD_WRK DUW WHERE DUW.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND DUW.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND DUW.UPLD_CSV_RQST_PK = #upldCsvRqstPk#
